community.title: Join a Global Community of Symbol Enthusiasts
community.description: Connect with people passionate about cultural symbols and heritage from around the world.

thematicCommunities.title: Thematic Communities
thematicCommunities.description: Join specialized communities focused on particular symbol traditions, regions, or time periods.

personalSpace.title: Personal Collections
personalSpace.description: Build and organize your own library of symbolic patterns that resonate with you.

intuitiveNavigation.title: Advanced Discovery
intuitiveNavigation.description: Explore connections between symbols across cultures and time periods with our intuitive navigation.
